mission_data.mission_description: Long ago, Torgoth legends spoke of a powerful ship originating from Ximni space believed to signal the dawn of a new age. It is said that untold fortune would await any captain and crew that could control this vessel.^ Recently, rumors from a marginalized faction of Torgoth whale sympathizers have surfaced, describing a Ximni ship they believe to be the one fortold in the prophecies. They spoke of a ship with incredible firepower, striking from more than double the range of its best-equipped rivals, destroying everything in its path.^ Now, informants with ties to the Arvonian spy network have traced its jump signature to the Obscuritas sector, deep in Ximni territory, where it is undergoing repairs. As an up-and-coming crew of ruffians and scofflaws, you have tasked yourselves with the acquisition of this crown jewel of the Ximni fleet, the Opulent Diadem. Avoiding detection in your scout ship, the Phantom Pulsar, your crew has made the treacherous journey to the edge of the sector.^ Will you achieve fame and glory, or will your ship be lost to Obscuritas? In this tactical game of space checkers, you're but a few jumps away from becoming a true pirate king!

set_ship_text.desc: A typical group of whale watchers
set_ship_text.scan_desc: These Arvonians may be able to help your efforts, for a price.
set_ship_text.hailtext: So you want the Diadem? If you do us a favor to help us study the Charybdis, we'll give you the access codes to activate our sleeper agent on board that vessel. We need a sample of the nebula gas it excretes, telemetry data tracking the effects of its attacks, and finally a tag on it to monitor its movements in the sector.

event.name: Comms Init Fix
event.incoming_comms_text: Welcome to the Obscuritas sector. Be advised that there are several ships patrolling this region deep inside Ximni territory. Being detected by them or the bases prior to capturing the Diadem will automatically trigger a time jump to the start of the mission. After that, you'll be on your own. Good luck.

event.name: Patrols Init
event.incoming_comms_text: The elite Ximni ships of the Obscuritas sector are given the designation "BAMF" or "Bunenag Aŝor Mokamer Flaz," which roughly translates to "Really expensive star murderer."

event.name: Notre Dame du Ciel Senses Player
in_purple_neb
event.incoming_comms_text: That nebula sample should do nicely. Our scientists will begin their spectral analysis shortly, thanks to your efforts.

event.name: Pirates_far_pigpen
event.incoming_comms_text: The dark energy readings from that encounter are off the charts! This data should help us better understand the Charybdis's aggression patterns.

event.name: tagged_pigpen
event.incoming_comms_text: Brilliant! We can now track the movements of the Charybdis beyond the shroud of its flatulence.

event.name: PuzzleSolved
event.incoming_comms_text: Excellent work, Phantom_Pulsar. Your reward is ready for pickup, as promised.

set_ship_text.scan_desc: Need a hint? Hail this ship.
set_ship_text.hailtext: After the Diadem surrenders, use the shuttle to transfer personnel between vessels

event.name: StopDiadem
event.incoming_comms_text: Ready to accept your boarding party. To transfer command of this ship, send over crew members in your shuttle and follow the instructions on your comms console.

set_comms_button.text: Reroute comms to shuttle, Capture Diadem and detonate charges on Pulsar

if_comms_button.text: Reroute comms to shuttle, Capture Diadem and detonate charges on Pulsar

clear_comms_button.text: Reroute comms to shuttle, Capture Diadem and detonate charges on Pulsar

event.name: Act 2

set_ship_text.hailtext: Without access to a base, you need a vigoranium nodule to replenish your damcon teams.

set_ship_text.name: TerranMercenary
set_ship_text.desc: May hold the secret to solving your damcon problem
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Guaranteed vigoranium nodule drop on kill or surrender

event.incoming_comms_text: Congratulations on becoming the proud owner of your very own Ximni Battleship! Looks a little worse for the wear, and you seem to be short on a repair crew. We know a way out of here, but it won't be any use to you as long as your ship is broken. Fix it up, then rendezvous with us when you're ready to go. Meanwhile, we'll keep our interdimensional shortcut open for you. Good luck.

big_message.title: You Win!
big_message.subtitle1: All hail the new pirate king!
